Changelog
=========

## Unreleased

## 2.0.0 - 2017-09-08

### Changed
- Added support for Craft 3.

## 1.2.1 - 2016-10-18

### Fixed
- Fixed a JavaScript error when clicking the cancel button in a modal.


## 1.2.0 - 2015-12-20

### Changed
- Updated to take advantage of Craft 2.5 features.

## 1.1.0 - 2014-12-11
- Initial release.
